# Workshop slides: Make it reproducibleR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This repository contains the slides for the workshop "Make it reproducibleR". The workshop focus on the importance of reproducibility and introduces tools and best practices to make production ready code in R.
